animals

Class Animal

  • java.lang.Object
    • animals.Animal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAquatic, IAvian, ICheckType, IInsect, IMammal, IReptile
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Aquatic, Avian, Insect, Mammal, Reptile

    public abstract class Animal
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAquatic, IAvian, IInsect, IMammal, IReptile

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int lastanimalId
      Keeps track of the amount of animals that have been created during the program lifetime

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Animal()
      Initializes a newly created Animal object so that it represents an empty Animal.

      Changes the variable breastFeeding value to true
      boolean checkAnimalType(Animal animal, SubType expectedType)
      Method has to be implemented whenever an animal executes one action from any other interface, it has to check if animal IS an instance of the class or if it IS a subtype of the class If an aquatic tries to fly, it has to have the interface IFly implemented and it has to be the subtype of Avian
